**Thecamp** is an **11,000 m² technology hub** located in Aix-en-Provence, founded by **Frédéric Chevalier**.  
Since its inauguration in 2017, it has positioned itself as an **innovation and training campus**, with the ambition of *"acting as a facilitator of innovation."*


![Website preview](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62568994/277140766-24634c15-5848-4139-a440-215e9465ab93.PNG?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..jw3OzXcDHa-1BEinbp6RsqTSVb7-X794Q3_D-kyfBTw)

> The website fetches data from an API that has changed multiple times, so some UI inconsistencies may appear.
[Online page](https://ena-shepherd.github.io/Thecamp-React/)

---

Thecamp is designed to bring together a wide range of actors, including:  

- **Companies** seeking innovation strategies  
- **Institutions** looking for transformation  
- **Students & startups** eager to experiment  
- **Creators** pushing the boundaries of technology and design  

Thecamp hosts many events all year long, such as:

- Learning programs
- Seminars
- Creative residencies
- Concerts
- Large-scale events

---
